archimate:Goal.name: Operating more sustainably
archimate:Goal.documentation: Big Data technology will enable in memory computing analytics to process huge data sets through complex models, helping business subject matter experts to more accurately evaluate population growth impact, climate change impact, resilience planning for drought, flooding, power outages, where we invest in network resilience, desalination investment impact, capital delivery schemes such as new reservoirs, water source management impact on the environment, water quality forensic analysis, research and development, predictions of asset failure, burst and leaks, what assets should be replaced to reduce whole life costs.
